## Current thoughts/ideas/plans

I plan to study mental health in COVID19 Pandemic. I am particularly interested in understanding how pandemic has changed people's mental status. I've found some datasets related to mental health, including a dataset that discuss the mental health search terms in COVID-19 and how much is the world's concern about mental health affected by the pandemic.
